protein.specific_function: Dephosphorylates cellular tyrosine kinases, including PTK2B/PYK2, and thereby regulates signaling via PTK2B/PYK2.

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on ester bonds
non-membrane spanning protein tyrosine phosphatase activity
